Class Monster

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Character
          Monster

public class Monster
extends Character

The Monster superclass that extends character. All monsters extend this superclass, and have the parameters and methods required of monsters.

Version:
May 29, 2017
Author:
Keontrye Hsieh, Vikram Miryala, Richard Ma, Period: 3, Assignment: Pokenom, Sources: N/A
